scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=@nudge-ai/core && npm run build --workspace=@nudge-ai/cli
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently -n core,cli,example -c blue,green,magenta "npm run dev --workspace=@nudge-ai/core" "npm run dev --workspace=@nudge-ai/cli" "npm run dev --workspace=example-express"
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=@nudge-ai/core && npm run clean --workspace=@nudge-ai/cli
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --workspace=@nudge-ai/core && npm run typecheck --workspace=@nudge-ai/cli
